content: lc p1 cast-on see pg 2 join in the round place unique mark- work from * to end of round er for bor rnds 10-12 * p1 k3 2 times p3 k2 p1 k2 p2 work round 1 k1 sl1p wyif from * to end of round round 2 sl1p wyib p1 round 13 *1/3 lc p1 1/3 rc p2 1/1 rc p1 1/1 lc p2 note if not working tubular co replace these 2 rnds with 1x1 work from * to end of round rib rnds 14-16 *k4 p1 k4 p3 k1 p1 k1 p3 work from * to rnds 3 * k1 p1 end of round repeat round 3 for 1 5 /4 cm round 17 *1/3 lc p1 1/3 rc p3 1/1/1 rpc p3 work from * to end of round increase round *k2 m1 k3 m1 k11 work from * to end of round 54 sts decrease round *k2 k2tog k1 ssk k11 work from * to end of round 48 sts switch to larger needles note place a stitch marker after each 18-st chart repeat if keep using larger needles desired note remove repeat markers round 1 * k1 p1 round 1 *p3 1/1/1 rpc p3 1/3 rc p1 1/3 lc work from repeat round 1 for 1 5 /4 cm * to end of round rnds 2-4 *p3 k1 p1 k1 p3 k4 p1 k4 work from * work sewn bind off see video link on pg 2 round 5 *p2 1/1 lc p1 1/1 rc p2 1/3 rc p1 1/3 lc work from * to end of round finishing rnds 6-8 *p2 k2 p1 k2 p3 k3 p1 2 times work from * weave in ends and give a light steam block to finished di- to end of round mensions on pg 2 ©2024 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 4
